Texts.Chs: 这些毛茸茸的生物似乎在这个象限中大量出现，而且种类繁多。我们仍然不能确定皮毛的功能性需求，而其他适应方式则更为可行。我们将继续观察，因为我们知道我们的温度中立的循环系统明显优于这个星系中的所有生命。
Texts.Eng: These furry creatures seem to occur in abundance in this quadrant, and in so many varieties. We remain uncertain on the functional need for fur when other means of adaptation are far more viable. We shall continue to observe, knowing our temperature-neutral circulatory system is clearly superior to that of all life within this galaxy.
